content: {A期待}It's [article_or_num:1,{赠礼}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{赠礼}]</style>~! O' Skies Above, how did you know I was craving this? I was just about to try my luck at Starsea!

content: {A惊叹}Oh, it's [article_or_num:1,{赠礼}] <style=Highlight>[quant_noun:1,{赠礼}]</style>! Thanks! Y'know, I used to live in a bamboo grove when I was little, and pretty much everything at home was made of bamboo.

content: It's firm, resilient, and has a gentle, fresh scent. The young shoots go great in just about any dish!

content: {A沉醉闻}I could taste the flavor of that <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> from miles away! You've made an incredible dish using the recipe that I gave you~!

content: {A惊叹}Did you make this <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> yourself mah~?! It looks so fresh and tasty, thank you!

content: Every time I go out into the Starsea, I come back with my Backpack full. Nothing's better than apples to keep you going.
